name: Me Petting My Cat Simulator
description:
A game where you go across the timelines  after a nuclear bomb drops,

the ultimate goal? dont die to the bomb! simple as that... right?

a mix of Henry Stickmin and DSaF, and by that a mean a lot of choices, different endings, and a shit load of stock images.

based on https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NWDdl6XDYe8&t=0s (SPOILERS)

music by a variety of people, i swear i intend to add credits, and if you get pissed enough email me and ill just slap the credits on here until the games fully 100% done.

MAINLY kevin mcleoud. mans a godsend
